title: Spinach and Goat Cheese Salad
ingredients: ['120g walnuts, coarsely chopped', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1/2 (340g) jar pickled beetroot', '4 tablespoons cider vinegar', '1 teaspoon chicken stock granules', '1/2 teaspoon garlic granules', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '225g baby spinach leaves, rinsed and dried', '115g goat cheese, crumbled']
